review: When the best feature about a piece of technology is the price, its not too helpful a review. So let me explain. I didn't need this, having a cable connecting my iPad to both my TV's for watching Netflix and NHL games, along with anything else on the iPad. But for the cost of a parking ticket, it was too cool to pass-up. I have gotten used to using it for Netflix and YouTube and it definitely performs as advertised. But unless they integrate other media sources into Chromecast...and quickly (NHL starts October 2nd), my rating will drop to it's OK and just be more careful where you park.

review: Works as advertised. I was lucky enough to get it first day with the netflix code so the thing cost as much as dinner.  It does everything it says. Some people want to cry that it doesn't do things they hacked together and reversed engineered.  Well a company has the right to change their own product in the background and has no obligations to accommodate what you think you know. They offer an SDK to people who want to properly develop for it.
